name: Night Casters - ALPHA DEMO
description:
You’re the infamous second-in-command to the greatest dark wizard in recent history. When an early death grants you the opportunity to turn back time, you gladly take the chance. Your goal this time around? Prevent the rise of the dark lord you once served.

Welcome back to magic academy.

Note: game is still in early development.

Current Demo

  • First half of Chapter 0
  • Release of concept
  • Basic stat system
    • In-depth personality system that affects dialogue

Upcoming

  • Full release of Chapter 0, start of Chapter 1
  • Save system
  • Configurable settings
  • Introduction of first two love interests

Future Plans

  • 6 love interests
  • More chapters
  • Multiple endings

(by order of appearance)
